name: Worm Adventure 2
description:
After regaining his human form again in worm adventure 1, our hero eats a bowl of oatmeal and goes to bed; however, unbeknownst to him, the oatmeal was poisoned. Sadly, upon waking up, he has been changed back into a worm (how convenient)! It's up to you to change him back to a human--again. Use the arrow-keys to crawl, squirm, wiggle and leap your way to the end of the game, and most importantly, don't get frustrated. The whole game can be beaten in under 5 minutes if you know what you are doing, but it should take a new player between 30 minutes to hour.

DOWNLOAD INFO

1. Click Download below.

2. Open folder and double click "worm adventure 2"

3. Click "extract all" and click "ok"

4. Double click "worm adventure 2"
